verses.verse: "In that <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H4726>fountain<s%> will be <S%H6605>opened<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and for the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> for <S%H9128>sin<s%> and for <S%H5079>impurity.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "that I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H6091>idols<s%> from the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> and I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5674>remove<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> and the <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H5012>prophesies,<s%> then his father and <S%H1>mother<s%> who <S%H517>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to him will <S%H3205>say<s%> to him, 'You shall not <S%H559>live,<s%> for you have <S%H2421>spoken<s%> <S%H1696>falsely<s%> in the <S%H8267>name<s%> of the <S%H8034>Lord<s%>'; and his father and <S%H3068>mother<s%> who <S%H1>gave<s%> <S%H517>birth<s%> to him will <S%H3205>pierce<s%> him <S%H3205>through<s%> when he <S%H1856>prophesies.<s%>

"Also it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in that <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> will <S%H376>each<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of his <S%H2384>vision<s%> when he <S%H5012>prophesies,<s%> and they will not <S%H3847>put<s%> on a <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H155>robe<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> to <S%H3584>deceive;<s%>

but he will <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I am not a <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> I am a <S%H376>tiller<s%> <S%H5647><s%> of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> for a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7069>sold<s%> me as a slave in my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>'

"And one will <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H4100>'What<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4347>wounds<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H3027>arms<s%>?' Then he will <S%H559>say,<s%> '[Those] with <S%H834>which<s%> I was <S%H5221>wounded<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H157>friends.<s%>'

<S%H5782>"Awake,<s%> O <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> My <S%H7462>Shepherd,<s%> And <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1397>man,<s%> My <S%H5997>Associate,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%> <S%H5221>"Strike<s%> the <S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> that the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> may be <S%H6327>scattered;<s%> And I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> My <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6819>little<s%> ones.

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%>" <S%H5002>Declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "That <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6310>parts<s%> in it will be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> [and] <S%H1478>perish;<s%> But the <S%H7992>third<s%> will be <S%H3498>left<s%> in it.

"And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H7992>part<s%> through the <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H6884>Refine<s%> them as <S%H3701>silver<s%> is <S%H6884>refined,<s%> And <S%H974>test<s%> them as <S%H2091>gold<s%> is <S%H974>tested.<s%> They will <S%H7121>call<s%> on My <S%H8034>name,<s%> And I will <S%H6030>answer<s%> them; I will <S%H559>say,<s%> 'They are My <S%H5971>people,<s%>' And they will <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is my <S%H430>God.<s%>'"
